name: @business-as-code/tests-git-server
description: Clone and push to git repository test fixtures over HTTP.

scripts.gitServerHttp:stopBackground: node ./http-daemon.js stop || kill-port 8174 || true; ! pnpm --filter @business-as-code/tests-git-server run gitServerHttp:isRunning
scripts.gitServerSshPubKey:stopBackground: GIT_SSH_MOCK_SERVER_PUBKEY=true node ./ssh-daemon.js stop || kill-port 2222 || true; ! pnpm --filter @business-as-code/tests-git-server run gitServerSshPubKey:isRunning
scripts.gitServerSshPassword:stopBackground: GIT_SSH_MOCK_SERVER_PASSWORD=password node ./ssh-daemon-password.js stop || kill-port 2223 || true; ! pnpm --filter @business-as-code/tests-git-server run gitServerSshPassword:isRunning
scripts.gitServerSshAnonymous:stopBackground: node ./ssh-daemon-anonymous.js stop || kill-port 2224 || true; ! pnpm --filter @business-as-code/tests-git-server run gitServerSshAnonymous:isRunning

author: William Hilton <wmhilton@gmail.com>
